name: Desert Rush
description:
Even though I knew I didn't have enough time, I really wanted to try building an army management sim . I recently played a game called Shieldwall and liked it a lot.  Thought it would fit the theme and this jam could be a nice learning experience for me. And it did :)

I want to change a loooot of things; but I guess I will have to do all those sometime after the jam is over. For now, I only had 2.5 days to develop, so I couldn't complete the game even with the help of art assets. 

It still feels nice to run around with the army, so I submitted :)

Hope you like it.

-------- GAMEPLAY --------

Capture points (tents) by being the majority in their range.

Once they are captured, they will start soldiers for the respective owner. Every point has a different production cap and rate.

More soldiers can help you to capture points faster and be the majority.

You can command your army to be in a certain formation or stay at certain point. Enemy leader will do the same.

You would clash your armies and fight to the death... But, I didn't have time to develop that part :)

So right now, there is no "game" to be played to be honest. But it is still fun to hang around, so I submitted it.

-------- CONTROLS --------

Movement : A W S D

Jump  / Double Jump : Spacebar

Left Shift Hold  : Run

Left Mouse Click : Attack ( It doesn't do anything right now )

Call To Arms Formations : 1 ( Grid ), 2 (Circle) , 3 (  Triangle )
